Sentencas: ZrO2-8% Y2O3 (YSZ) thick film was deposited on a YSZ-NiO anode and co-sintered to obtain a gas-tight electrolyte for an application as Solid Oxide Fuel Cell.
Titulo: A composite sol-gel process to prepare a YSZ electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A YSZ sol-gel composite sol is synthesized from a YSZ colloidal binder and a YSZ commercial powder and deposited as a thick (>10 mu m) monolayer by the dip-coating process.
Titulo: A composite sol-gel process to prepare a YSZ electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The evolution of the composite sol viscosity with time and its influence on the deposited film thickness is studied.
Titulo: A composite sol-gel process to prepare a YSZ electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The influence of the composite sol composition, the film sintering on the films microstructure is also studied in order to achieve dense films.
Titulo: A composite sol-gel process to prepare a YSZ electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The interest of co-sintering the electrolyte with the anodic support is demonstrated.
Titulo: A composite sol-gel process to prepare a YSZ electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Ionic conductivity and activation energy are measured on pellets obtained from pressed-powder obtained from (a) the calcination of composite sol and (b) the commercial powder.
Titulo: A composite sol-gel process to prepare a YSZ electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Conductivity of 0.03 S cm(-1) at 800 degrees C and activation energy of 0.9 eV were measured through impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: A composite sol-gel process to prepare a YSZ electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Finally, an entire cell is processed with the developed electrolyte and polarization curves (I-V) were measured at 850 degrees C. OCV of 1.23 V was achieved, indicating the quality of the synthesized YSZ electrolyte.
Titulo: A composite sol-gel process to prepare a YSZ electrolyte for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
